data.text: @davidzurawik U might want to check out on how @GMA has managed to avoid ever reporting on serious sex abuse allegation vs Tenn. Vol football team -players allegedly beat up teammates who defended girl accusing other players of rape- while Vol alum Robin Roberts was on show. #homecooking #bias
@davidzurawik I'm sure those were the terms to get the interview.

@davidzurawik she told her true. are you going to blame her because she did not trash and destroy Spacey as everybody expected? She's been a class act. She's not up for headlines or getting advantage of the metoo hype for her own image. Think about it. It would have been easier for her

@davidzurawik It’s neither her fcking job to discuss his filth nor say words just to please you, some total “whodat” wanking off on Twitter who wants to blame a woman simply because she worked hard at her craft and got cast beside a man who turned out to be a sexual predator.
